text: Lawrence Hotham Weatherill (1905-1984) was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He competed for England in the marathon at the 1934 British Empire Games in London. Four years later he competed for England at the 1938 British Empire Games in the 3 miles and 6 miles. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1984 deaths Category:English male long-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1934 British Empire Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1938 British Empire Games
title: Lawrence Weatherill
